CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Because of the threedimensional structure of spirobifluorene units , PSFDTBT is readily dissolved in common organic solvents such as chloroform , chlorobenzene , toluene , THF , 1,2-dichlorobenzene ( DCB ) , 1,2,4-trichlorobenzene ( TCB ) , etc.

Let's think step by step.

Material Name
---
spirobifluorene units
chloroform
chlorobenzene
toluene
THF
1,2-dichlorobenzene (DCB)
1,2,4-trichlorobenzene (TCB)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Material Name
---
spirobifluorene units
chloroform
chlorobenzene
toluene
THF
1,2-dichlorobenzene (DCB)
1,2,4-trichlorobenzene (TCB)

I have removed the term "etc." as it is a general word and does not refer to a specific material name. The other terms are all names of materials or solvents.

| --- |
| threedimensional structure |

Note: After reviewing the paragraph again, I realized that "threedimensional structure" is the only clear material property mentioned in the paragraph. The other entities are names of materials or solvents, but not properties.
